Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District -- 11.76 Mills Continuation - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parishwide School District of the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of eleven and seventy-six hundredths (11.76) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $929,040 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and repairing facilities, for purchase and leasing of property, for maintenance, replacement, repair and purchase of equipment and to purchase materials and supplies, with the revenues to be divided between each school in the District on a per pupil basis, said millage to represent a thirty-three hundredths of a mill (.33) increase (due to reappraisal) over the 11.43 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2019 pursuant to an election held on April 4, 2009?

Race.SpecificTitle: Epps School District No. 1 -- 4.57 Mills Renewal - SB - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Epps School District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Epps School District No. 1 of the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of four and fifty-seven hundredths (4.57) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $142,900 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and repairing facilities, for purchase and lease of property, for maintenance, replacement, repair and purchase of equipment and to purchase institutional materials and supplies for Epps High School?
